name: Curse of the Undercurrent
description:
When character(s) on this side of the playing field use Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts: They must spend 1 extra Elemental Die.
Usages: 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When character(s) on this side of the playing field use Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts:</color> They must spend 1 extra Elemental Die.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color>: 2</color>
